original_title: Sri Lanka sells extra Rs5.9bn Treasury bills after auction
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka has sold 5,999 million rupees of treasury bills offered on tap at an average rate of 8.04 percent, the state debt office said.
The debt office sold 12-month bills (LKA36426G174) at 8.04 percent.
On Wednesday (16) the debt office raised 85 billion rupees of 3, 6 and 12 month bills.
Sri Lanka Treasuries yields edge up, low take up 3-month bills
